title: Smart Data Models - CsConverter
description: Adapted from CIM data models. DC side of the current source converter (CSC).

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be CsConverter

alpha.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Firing angle, typical value between 10 and 18 degrees for a rectifier. CSC state variable, result from power flow. Default: 0.0

gamma.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Extinction angle. CSC state variable, result from power flow. Default: 0.0

maxAlpha.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum firing angle. CSC configuration data used in power flow. Default: 0.0

maxGamma.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum extinction angle. CSC configuration data used in power flow. Default: 0.0

maxIdc.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. The maximum direct current (Id) on the DC side at which the converter should operate. Converter configuration data use in power flow. Default: 0.0

minAlpha.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Minimum firing angle. CSC configuration data used in power flow. Default: 0.0

minGamma.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Minimum extinction angle. CSC configuration data used in power flow. Default: 0.0

minIdc.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. The minimum direct current (Id) on the DC side at which the converter should operate. CSC configuration data used in power flow. Default: 0.0

operatingMode.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Indicates whether the DC pole is operating as an inverter or as a rectifier. CSC control variable used in power flow. Default: None

ratedIdc.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Rated converter DC current, also called IdN. Converter configuration data used in power flow. Default: 0.0

targetAlpha.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Target firing angle. CSC control variable used in power flow. Default: 0.0

targetGamma.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Target extinction angle. CSC  control variable used in power flow. Default: 0.0

targetIdc.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. DC current target value. CSC control variable used in power flow. Default: 0.0
